Interface CassandraParameterAccessor

All Superinterfaces:

CassandraParametersParameterAccessor
public interface CassandraParameterAccessor
extends org.springframework.data.repository.query.ParameterAccessor

Cassandra specific ParameterAccessor.

Author:
Alex Shvid

getBindableValue, getPageable, getSort, hasBindableNullValue, iterator
 

Method Detail

getConsistencyLevel

ConsistencyLevel getConsistencyLevel()
Returns ConsistencyLevel for the query operation. By default Cassandra uses ConsistencyLevel.QUORUM. Useful for all gets and puts operations

Returns:
ConsistencyLevel enum

getRetryPolicy

RetryPolicy getRetryPolicy()
Returns RetryPolicy for the query operation. By default Cassandra uses RetryPolicy.DEFAULT. Useful for all gets and puts operations

Returns:
RetryPolicy enum

getQueryTracing

Boolean getQueryTracing()
Returns QueryTracing for the query operation.

Returns:
QueryTracing boolean

getTtl

Integer getTtl()
Returns TTL time in seconds for insert and update operations. It is an expiration time for the stored value in Cassandra. Usefull for insert, update operations.

Returns:
ttl in seconds

getTimestamp

Long getTimestamp()
Return timestamp long in milliseconds. Each cell in Cassandra has timestamp. Usefull for insert, update, delete operations.

Returns:
